attributes.action: Grant UKIP new seats in the House of Lords
attributes.additional_details:
Given the successes of UKIP in the Local and European Elections, we request you grant UKIP new Peers in the House of Lords.


Page 27 of the Coalition agreement states:

“Lords appointments will be made with the objective of creating a second chamber that is reflective of the share of the vote secured by the political parties in the last general election.”

UKIP got nearly a million votes at the 2010 General Election, and won the 2014 European Elections but has yet to see any new peers.
